aka: 亚美尼亚 - 沉睡中的美人

cast.name: 沃伊切赫·基拉尔 Wojciech Kilar
菲利普·勒克莱尔 Philippe Leclerc

trans_title: 亚美尼亚：沉睡中的美人
亚美尼亚 - 沉睡中的美人
introduction: 亚美尼亚旅游宣传片,50分钟,由05年亚美尼亚选美小姐Lucine Tovmassian出镜做讲解.Armenia - The Sleeping Beauty (2005, A Tourist Guide)Carmen Labaki (Director)Diran Bagdadian (Producer)Pierre Bagdadian (Producer)Language: French, Arabic, EnglishColor / 50 min.This documentary contains breathraking scenes from the majestic landscape of mounts Ararat and Arakadz, as well as the charming, peaceful Lake Sevan. With fine selected music, it takes the viewer on a tour of modern-day Yerevan, the capital, where theaters, markets, coffee shops, restaurants, and night clubs attract people day and night. There's information about the historic churches (of the first Christian state of the world), marvellous monuments and statues, as well as the museums. Miss Armenia, Lucine Tovmassian, accompanies the camera for guidance and a resume of an ancient country, where things are changing following the collapse of the Soviet Union.
chinese_title: 亚美尼亚：沉睡中的美人
